attributes.action: SCRAP THE PLAN TO ABOLISH CATCHMENT AREAS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is the politics of envy overiding the reality that the plan will do nothing the improve bad schools in economically challenged areas and could effect the quality of goods schools in wealthier areas. Children will be travelling to schools that could be a considerable distance from home, and siblings attending different schools some distance from each other.Also, it will have a negative effect on the community - children living the same area no going to the same schools in the area and siblings attending the same schools. Surely this government should be concentrating on improving the schools that are under performing and leaving the ones that work alone!
